titleStmt.title: House-hold observations necessary for these times.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Paine, and are to be sold by F. Coles in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: In verse: "If thou, my Servant, wilt thy Master please," ...
Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan: 15th 1646"; the '7' in the imprint has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
